title: KIM SWITCH / KLAASJE REACTION
description: Kim reacts to you losing your shit (Composure fail) when the Hardie boys said the victim is a young woman called Klaasje in the Whirling-in-Rags.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You looked strange when he mention..."
links.english: "You looked strange when he mentioned the assault victim's name." He looks you in the eye: "Do you know that woman?"
links.polish: „Dziwnie wyglądałeś, gdy wspomniał imię ofiary ataku” – patrzy ci prosto w oczy. „Czy znasz tę kobietę?”
links.belarusian: «Дзіўна выглядаў ты, калі ўзгадаў імя ахвяры нападу», — глядзіць табе прама ў вочы. «Ты ведаеш гэтую жанчыну?»

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.english: "Yes."
links.polish: „Tak”.
links.belarusian: «Так».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is there something I should know b..."
links.english: "Is there something I should know before we talk to her?"
links.polish: „Czy powinienem coś wiedzieć, zanim ją przesłuchamy?”
links.belarusian: "Ці павінен я нешта ведаць, перш чым мы яе дапытваем?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whatever you do, don't say the firs..."
links.english: Whatever you do, don't say the first thing.
links.polish: Cokolwiek zamierzasz, nie mów tego pierwszego.
links.belarusian: Што б ты ні планаваў, не кажы гэта першаму.

links.title: You: ""I didn't rape her.""
links.english: "I didn't rape her."
links.polish: „Nie zgwałciłem jej”.
links.belarusian: «Я не згвалціў яе».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What you're saying is..." he says..."
links.english: "What you're saying is..." he says in a low, calm voice. "*You* raped her?"
links.polish: „Chcesz powiedzieć, że...” – przemawia niskim, spokojnym głosem – „...*zgwałciłeś* ją?”
links.belarusian: «Хочаш сказаць, што...» – гаворыць нізкім, спакойным голасам – «...*згвалціў* яе?»

links.title: Half Light: "Ice is forming on the inside of you..."
links.english: Ice is forming on the inside of your chest cavity, cold sweat trickles down your neck...
links.polish: W klatce piersiowej czujesz bryłę lodu, po karku spływa ci zimny pot...
links.belarusian: У грудной клетцы адчуваеш кавалак лёду, па шыі цячэ халодны пот...

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.english: "No."
links.polish: „Nie”.
links.belarusian: «Не».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then don't *ever* say that again."..."
links.english: "Then don't *ever* say that again." There's a pause.
links.polish: „Więc *nigdy więcej* tego nie mów” – zapada chwila ciszy.
links.belarusian: «Таму *ніколі больш* гэтага не кажы», — настае момант маўчання.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else?""
links.english: "What else?"
links.polish: „Co jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: «Што яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""I met her. In the hallway, after I..."
links.english: "I met her. In the hallway, after I woke up."
links.polish: „Spotkałem ją już. W korytarzu, po tym, jak się obudziłem”.
links.belarusian: «Я ўжо сустрэў яе. У калідоры, пасля таго як я прачнуўся».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Understood -- you were not in good..."
links.english: "Understood -- you were not in good shape on Monday."
links.polish: „Rozumiem – w poniedziałek nie byłeś w dobrej formie”.
links.belarusian: «Разумею – у панядзелак ты не быў у добрай форме».

links.title: You: ""She knows I didn't remember being..."
links.english: "She knows I didn't remember being a cop."
links.polish: „Wie, że nie pamiętałem o byciu policjantem”.
links.belarusian: «Ведаеш, што я не памятаў, што быў паліцыянтам».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he nods. "That's manageable.""
links.english: "Okay," he nods. "That's manageable."
links.polish: „W porządku” – kiwa głową. „Poradzimy sobie z tym”.
links.belarusian: «Добра» – ківае галавой. «Мы справімся з гэтым».

links.title: You: ""I tried to hit on her...""
links.english: "I tried to hit on her..."
links.polish: „Próbowałem ją poderwać...”
links.belarusian: «Паспрабаваў яе зачапіць...»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Understood." He's stone-faced."
links.english: "Understood." He's stone-faced.
links.polish: „Rozumiem” – odpowiada z kamienną twarzą.
links.belarusian: «Разумею», — адказвае з каменным тварам.

links.title: You: ""It went pretty okay, I guess.""
links.english: "It went pretty okay, I guess."
links.polish: „Poszło chyba w sumie nieźle”.
links.belarusian: "Здаецца, усё прайшло не так ужо і дрэнна".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It doesn't matter how it *went* of..."
links.english: "It doesn't matter how it *went* officer -- what else?"
links.polish: „Nieważne jak *poszło*, oficerze. Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: "Не важна, як *пайшло*, афіцэр. Што-небудзь яшчэ?"

links.title: You: ""Better not to add anything to that.""
links.english: "Better not to add anything to that."
links.polish: „Lepiej nic więcej tu już nie dodawać”.
links.belarusian: «Лепш нічога больш сюды не дадаваць».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he nods. "What else did you..."
links.english: "Mhm," he nods. "What else did you do?"
links.polish: „Mhm” – kiwa głową. „Co jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: «Мгм» – ківае галавой. «Што яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""She said I'm going to have to inte..."
links.english: "She said I'm going to have to interrogate her later and it's going to *suck* for me."
links.polish: „Powiedziała, że będę ją musiał później przesłuchać i że będzie to dla mnie *przypałowe*”.
links.belarusian: «Яна сказала, што мне давядзецца яе пазней апытаць, і што гэта будзе для мяне *праблемай*».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It *is*," he nods. "This would hav..."
links.english: "It *is*," he nods. "This would have been good to know *before*."
links.polish: „I miała *rację*” – kiwa głową. „Dobrze byłoby wiedzieć o tym *wcześniej*”.
links.belarusian: «І мела *рацыю*», — ківае галавой. «Добра было б ведаць пра гэта *раней*».

links.title: You: ""It didn't come up.""
links.english: "It didn't come up."
links.polish: „Nie wyszło w rozmowie”.
links.belarusian: „Не атрымалася ў размове”.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It should have. Anything else?""
links.english: "It should have. Anything else?"
links.polish: „A powinno. Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: «А павінна. Што-небудзь яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.english: "Okay."
links.polish: „Dobrze”.
links.belarusian: «Добра».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything else?""
links.english: "Anything else?"
links.polish: „Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: "Штосьці яшчэ?"

links.title: You: ""She knows I did some pretty crazy..."
links.english: "She knows I did some pretty crazy stuff before I passed out. That I partied hard. And not very mental-healthily."
links.polish: „Wie, że zrobiłem sporo wariactw, zanim straciłem przytomność. Że ostro imprezowałem. W niezbyt zdrowy dla umysłu sposób”.
links.belarusian: «Ведаe, што я нарабіў шмат вар'яцтваў, перш чым страціў прытомнасць. Што вeсьма весела тусаваўся. У не занадта здаровы для розуму спосаб».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So she overheard you? Or did you *..."
links.english: "So she overheard you? Or did you *party* together?"
links.polish: „Więc słyszała cię? Czy może *imprezowaliście* razem?”
links.belarusian: «Дык яна цябе чула? Ці, можа, *святкавалі* разам?»

links.title: Inland Empire: "So this is what it feels like to be..."
links.english: So this is what it feels like to be *interviewed*...
links.polish: A więc tak to jest być *przesłuchiwanym*...
links.belarusian: Ну вось як гэта быць *дапытаным*...

links.title: You: "Fun."
links.english: Fun.
links.polish: Miło.
links.belarusian: Прыемна.

links.title: Inland Empire: "I wouldn't say it is."
links.english: I wouldn't say it is.
links.polish: Nie powiedziałbym.
links.belarusian: Я б не сказаў.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Of course it is, you slippery fuck!..."
links.english: Of course it is, you slippery fuck! Blast some insane-o at him, throw him off.
links.polish: Jasne, że miło, chytry pierdolcu! Zapodaj mu trochę wariactwa, zbij go z tropu!
links.belarusian: Вядома, што прыемна, хітрая сволач! Дадай яму трохі вар'яцтва, збі яго з тропу!

links.title: You: "Not very fun."
links.english: Not very fun.
links.polish: Niezbyt miło.
links.belarusian: Не вельмі прыемна.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You'll get through it, you slippery..."
links.english: You'll get through it, you slippery fuck! Blast some insane-o at him, throw him off.
links.polish: Dasz radę, chytry pierdolcu! Zapodaj mu trochę wariactwa, zbij go z tropu!
links.belarusian: Дай рады, хітры пан! Западзяй яму трохі вар'ятва, збі яго з толку!

links.title: Inland Empire: "You'll get through it."
links.english: You'll get through it.
links.polish: Jakoś dasz radę.
links.belarusian: Неяк справішся.

links.title: You: "I got nothing to hide."
links.english: I got nothing to hide.
links.polish: Nie mam nic do ukrycia.
links.belarusian: У мяне няма што хаваць.

links.title: Inland Empire: "What if you do -- but you just don'..."
links.english: What if you do -- but you just don't *remember* that you do?
links.polish: A jeśli masz? Tyle że *nie pamiętasz*, że masz?
links.belarusian: А калі ты маеш? Праўда, *не памятаеш*, што маеш?

links.title: You: ""She overheard me listening to musi..."
links.english: "She overheard me listening to music and doing weird things. From her room. It's the one next to yours."
links.polish: „Słyszała, jak słuchałem muzyki i robiłem dziwne rzeczy. Z jej pokoju. To ten obok twojego”.
links.belarusian: «Яна чула, як я слухаў музыку і рабіў дзіўныя рэчы. Са свайго пакоя. Гэта той побач з тваім».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything else?""
links.english: "Anything else?"
links.polish: „Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: "Штосьці яшчэ?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, we partied all right. Partie..."
links.english: "Yeah, we partied all right. Partied all night like the Inzany Boys."
links.polish: „Tak. Imprezowaliśmy całą noc. Całą noc jak Dzieciaki Obłędu”.
links.belarusian: «Так. Мы весяліліся ўсю ноч. Усю ноч, як Дзеці Вар'яцтва».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful. I'm going to assume she..."
links.english: "Wonderful. I'm going to assume she overheard you -- anything else?"
links.polish: „Cudownie. Założę, że po prostu cię słyszała. Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: «Цудоўна. Я меркую, што яна проста цябе пачула. Што-небудзь яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""I'm not going to answer that, lieu..."
links.english: "I'm not going to answer that, lieutenant."
links.polish: „Nie odpowiem na to pytanie, poruczniku”.
links.belarusian: «Я не адкажу на гэтае пытанне, лейтэнант».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm going to assume she overheard..."
links.english: "I'm going to assume she overheard you -- anything else?"
links.polish: „Założę, że cię słyszała. Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: «Мяркую, што цябе пачула. Што-небудзь яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""I asked her where we are, what cit..."
links.english: "I asked her where we are, what city is this, maybe even *what year*. Something like that."
links.polish: „Pytałem ją, gdzie jesteśmy, co to za miasto, może nawet *który mamy rok*. Coś w tym rodzaju”.
links.belarusian: «Я пытаўся ў яе, дзе мы знаходзімся, што гэта за горад, можа нават *які ў нас год*. Нешта ў гэтым родзе».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He shrugs. "That's clearly your int..."
links.english: He shrugs. "That's clearly your interrogation technique. Anything else?"
links.polish: Wzrusza ramionami. „To najwyraźniej twoja technika przesłuchiwania. Coś jeszcze?”
links.belarusian: Пажымае плячыма. «Гэта, відавочна, ваша тэхніка допыту. Што-небудзь яшчэ?»

links.title: You: ""That's it." [Leave.]"
links.english: "That's it." [Leave.]
links.polish: „To wszystko”. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: «Гэта ўсё». [Адыдзі].

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "We'll be all right, offic..."
links.english: He nods. "We'll be all right, officer. This is nothing."
links.polish: Kiwa głową. „Poradzimy sobie, oficerze. To nic poważnego”.
links.belarusian: Ківае галавой. „Справімся, афіцэр. Гэта нічога сур'ёзнага”.

Alternate1.english: "We'll be all right, lieutenant. This is nothing."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You feel fortified by his assurance..."
links.english: You feel fortified by his assurance. It's going to be all right.
links.polish: Czujesz się wzmocniony jego zapewnieniem. Wszystko będzie dobrze.
links.belarusian: Вы адчуваеце ўзмацненне ад яго запэўнівання. Усё будзе добра.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Is it, though? 'Nothing'? You're st..."
links.english: Is it, though? 'Nothing'? You're still in for a bumpy ride here, try not to mess it up.
links.polish: Ale czy to na pewno nic poważnego? Nadal czeka cię tu niełatwe zadanie, spróbuj tego nie spieprzyć.
links.belarusian: Але ці гэта дакладна нічога сур'ёзнага? Цябе ўсё роўна чакае тут нялёгкая задача, паспрабуй гэта не сапсаваць.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is unprofessional." He repeat..."
links.english: "This is unprofessional." He repeats: "Not sharing information with me is *unprofessional*."
links.polish: „To nieprofesjonalne” – oznajmia. „Ukrywanie przede mną informacji jest *nieprofesjonalne*” – powtarza.
links.belarusian: «Гэта непрафесійна,» — заяўляе ён. «Схаваць ад мяне інфармацыю *непрафесійна*,» — паўтарае ён.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "His opinion of you has lowered cons..."
links.english: His opinion of you has lowered considerably.
links.polish: Jego opinia o tobie znacząco się pogorszyła.
links.belarusian: Яго меркаванне пра цябе значна пагоршылася.

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.english: "No."
links.polish: „Nie”.
links.belarusian: "Не".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He repeats: "Officer, before we int..."
links.english: He repeats: "Officer, before we interview this woman -- is there something I should know?"
links.polish: Powtarza: „Oficerze, czy powinienem coś wiedzieć, zanim przesłuchamy tę kobietę?”
links.belarusian: Паўтарае: «Афіцэр, ці павінен я нешта ведаць, перш чым дапытваць гэтую жанчыну?»

links.title: Authority: "He's not leaving you a lot of room..."
links.english: He's not leaving you a lot of room to back off from this.
links.polish: Nie zostawia ci zbyt wiele przestrzeni na wycofanie się.
links.belarusian: Не пакідае табе шмат прасторы для адступлення.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not nothing, you were coming..."
links.english: "It's not nothing, you were coming apart at the seams." He looks you in the eye: "Do you know the assault victim?"
links.polish: „To nie było »nic takiego«, zupełnie się rozkleiłeś” – patrzy ci prosto w oczy. „Czy znasz ofiarę ataku?”
links.belarusian: «Гэта не было «нічога такога», ты цалкам разваліўся» – глядзіць табе прама ў вочы. «Ці знаёмы ты з ахвярай нападу?»

dialogueTree.title: You: ""You mean the sweating and the fidg..."
dialogueTree.english: "You mean the sweating and the fidgeting when he mentioned her name?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Masz na myśli pocenie się i nerwowość, kiedy wspomniał jej imię?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Ты маеш на ўвазе пот і нервовасць, калі згадаў яе імя?»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
links.english: "Yes."
links.polish: „Tak”.
links.belarusian: "Так".

links.title: You: ""And the... sort of... quivering je..."
links.english: "And the... sort of... quivering jello thing with the eye?" (Point to your twitching eye.)
links.polish: „I te... takie... dziwne tiki jednego oka?” (Wskaż na swoje podrygujące oko).
links.belarusian: «І гэта... такія... дзіўныя цікі аднаго вока?» (Пакажыце на сваё тузгаючаеся вока).

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
links.english: "Yes."
links.polish: „Tak”.
links.belarusian: "Так".

links.title: Drama: "'Tis art."
links.english: 'Tis art.
links.polish: To sztuka.
links.belarusian: Гэта мастацтва.

links.title: You: ""It's an art thing. You wouldn't un..."
links.english: "It's an art thing. You wouldn't understand."
links.polish: „To sztuka. Nie zrozumiałbyś”.
links.belarusian: «Гэта мастацтва. Ты не зразумеў бы».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Try me.""
links.english: "Try me."
links.polish: „Przekonajmy się”.
links.belarusian: «Давайце пераканаемся».

links.title: You: ""I think I know that woman.""
links.english: "I think I know that woman."
links.polish: „Chyba znam tę kobietę”.
links.belarusian: «Здаецца, я ведаю гэтую жанчыну».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The victim? Is there something I s..."
links.english: "The victim? Is there something I should know before we talk to her?"
links.polish: „Ofiarę? Czy powinienem coś wiedzieć, zanim ją przesłuchamy?”
links.belarusian: «Ахвяру? Ці павінен я нешта ведаць, перш чым мы яе апытаем?»
